detectors.description:
CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#807-828) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 (CompoundManager_2842.sol#822)

CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(BaseWallet,address,address) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#1117-1123) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- collateral == 0 && debt == 0 (CompoundManager_2842.sol#1120)
detectors.markdown:
[CompoundManager.exitMarketIfNeeded(BaseWallet,address,address)](CompoundManager_2842.sol#L1117-L1123) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [collateral == 0 && debt == 0](CompoundManager_2842.sol#L1120)

detectors.description: CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#807-828) has external calls inside a loop: debt = CToken(cToken).borrowBalanceCurrent(address(_wallet)) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#818)
detectors.markdown: [CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32)](CompoundManager_2842.sol#L807-L828) has external calls inside a loop: [debt = CToken(cToken).borrowBalanceCurrent(address(_wallet))](CompoundManager_2842.sol#L818)

detectors.description: CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#807-828) has external calls inside a loop: collateral = CToken(cToken).balanceOf(address(_wallet)) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#821)
detectors.markdown: [CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32)](CompoundManager_2842.sol#L807-L828) has external calls inside a loop: [collateral = CToken(cToken).balanceOf(address(_wallet))](CompoundManager_2842.sol#L821)

detectors.description: CompoundManager.closeLoan(BaseWallet,bytes32) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#807-828) has external calls inside a loop: _wallet.invoke(address(comptroller),0,abi.encodeWithSignature(exitMarket(address),address(cToken))) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#823)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in CompoundManager.openLoan(BaseWallet,address,uint256,address,uint256) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#781-800):
	External calls:
	- _wallet.invoke(address(comptroller),0,abi.encodeWithSignature(enterMarkets(address[]),markets)) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#796)
	- mint(_wallet,markets[0],_collateral,_collateralAmount) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#797)
	- borrow(_wallet,markets[1],_debtAmount) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#798)

	- LoanOpened(address(_wallet),_loanId,_collateral,_collateralAmount,_debtToken,_debtAmount) (CompoundManager_2842.sol#799)
